Class FacadeImpl

org.apache.camel.main.Main
fr.pantheonsorbonne.miage.FacadeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Facade, HostFacade, InternalFacadePlumbing, PlayerFacade
public class FacadeImpl extends org.apache.camel.main.Main implements InternalFacadePlumbing, Facade, HostFacade, PlayerFacade
This is the internal implementation of the facade, students should not use it directly for their assigment

      public GameCommand receiveGameCommand(Game game)
      Description copied from interface: Facade
      Block until we receive a command.

      We will not receive commands that are not for us, only command sent to all players or to just us
